name: Easy Google+ Widget
author: Michal Ozog√°n

sections.description: Googles+ widget which provides you public post from your timeline. It shows your statuses, images, videos, links and albums. You need create your google plus app (https://code.google.com/apis/console/b/0/?pli=1) and enter your api + your profile ID. The are also some customizations like size of your profile image, number of showed posts and max width of images.
sections.installation:
1. Upload easy-google-plus-widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add widget to your sidebar
sections.changelog:
0.2.7.2

Fix: files had UTF with BOM

0.2.7.1

Fix auto-update plugin version

0.2.7

Google do mistakes in fullImage url

0.2.6

Google made changes with video image url – fixed
Caching included

0.2.5

Google made changes with profile image url – fixed
Fixed showing of albums
Images are resizing to max size

0.2

Better work with css styles
Add support to showing google plus comments
Make links from hashtags

0.1.5

Fixed albums.

0.1

First version.
